item.title: Ark Invest’s Cathie Wood-Backed Quantum Solutions Bought $20.58 Million In Ethereum
item.description: Quantum Solutions’s Ethereum holdings sits at an unrealized loss of $4.71 million.

item.title: Jupiter Ticks Higher as CEO Weighs Pausing Buybacks After $70M Spent in 2025
item.description: The JUP token is 89% below its $1.83 peak. However, the token is up 58.43% since its low.

item.title: Bitcoin Turns 17 As Spot ETFs Suffer Historic Losses
item.description: Regulatory approval and institutional products have legitimized Bitcoin, but recent market activity shows that the ETF sector is in historical losses.

item.title: US Strikes Venezuela As Trump Claims President Maduro Capture, Crypto Markets Don’t Flinch
item.description: Trump claims Venezuelan President Maduro was captured after the US strike, but Bitcoin and altcoins remain resilient.

item.title: US Strikes Venezuela As Trump Claims President Maduro Capture, Crypto Markets Don’t Flinch
